word:
The next day we were on the cars, on our way to meet others who were investigating the land, and as I was afterward walking on the ground where the trees had been removed, lo, there was a furrow just as I had described 


                                    -260- 

it, and the men also who had criticized the appearance of the land. The words were spoken just as I had dreamed.--Ms 62, 1898, p. 2. ("Selection of the School Land at Cooranbong," June 26, 1898.)
